bayid.title: BayID
bayid.description: A system generated id tag for each bay object.

deviceid.title: DeviceID
deviceid.description: A system id for uniquely identifying the sensor device.

disabilityext1.title: DisabilityExt1
disabilityext1.description: For bays that aren't limited to disabled permits, how much time (minutes) a vehicle with disabled permit can spend in the spot. Usually twice the regular amount of time.

disabilityext2.description: For bays that aren't limited to disabled permits, how much time (minutes) a vehicle with disabled permit can spend in the spot. Usually twice the regular amount of time.

typedesc1.title: TypeDesc1
typedesc1.description: The type of restriction. Eg: "2P Meter" (two hour parking, paid for using a meter), "Disabled Only" (only vehicles with disabled permits can park).
